step_feedback.feedback: Good job squeezing your shoulder blades together!  Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Try to make the circular motion smoother and more controlled. Focus on keeping your movements gentle and consistent.
The circular motion seems a bit jerky; try to maintain a fluid, controlled movement throughout the repetitions. Remember to breathe deeply.

exercise_summary: You performed the shoulder rolls exercise.  Step 1 was done well, but steps 2 and 3 need more focus on smooth, controlled circular motions. Remember to breathe deeply while performing the exercise.
